description: Removes cross-account permissions from a signing profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: A human-readable name for the signing profile with permissions to be removed.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: An identifier for the current revision of the signing profile permissions.

parameters.name: statementId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the cross-account permissions statement.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: An identifier for the current revision of the profile permissions.
